# tracks

**Instance Property**

The tracks that a composition contains.

## Declaration

```swift
var tracks: [AVMutableCompositionTrack] { get }
```

## Discussion

In a mutable composition, the tracks are instances of [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVMutableCompositionTrack], whereas in [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVComposition] the tracks are instances of [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCompositionTrack].

## Accessing tracks

- **track(withTrackID:)**: Returns a track that contains the specified identifier.
- **tracks(withMediaType:)**: Returns tracks that contain media of a specified type.
- **tracks(withMediaCharacteristic:)**: Returns tracks that contain media of a specified characteristic.

items.description: Returns a track that contains the specified identifier.
items.name: track(withTrackID:)

items.description: Returns tracks that contain media of a specified type.
items.name: tracks(withMediaType:)

items.description: Returns tracks that contain media of a specified characteristic.
